value.title: StarCraft 2: The SMARTEST & DUMBEST Strategy!
value.excerpt: I've still not decided if this was extremely smart or extremely dumb... Subscribe for more videos: http://lowko.tv/youtube Planetary Fortress Cringe: https://goo.gl/4FBLqd  What if you succesfully manage to distract and confuse your opponent for such a long time that you can mine out the Gold base?

value.title: StarCraft 2: The UNEXPECTED World Champion! (Grand Finals)
value.excerpt: The Grand Finals of the StarCraft 2 World Championships played at IEM Katowice. In this video I cast the Terran versus Terran that was played between Oliveira (TIME) and Maru. The winner of this match is the new StarCraft 2 World Champion.  Photos used in the video are made by ESL: https://twitter.com/ESLSC2/

value.title: StarCraft 2: The Very BEST Of The WORST! (Bronze League Heroes)

Cure has been playing very well over the last few months, and in this series he takes on one of the best Zerg players.
